item.title: GDExtension - How to Write Your First Extension
item.description: With Godot 4.0 on the horizon a lot of people want to try out the new technologies that are coming with the new version. One of these is the GDExtension system that will be replacing the older GDNative system. GDNative was introduced as a means to enhance the editor itself by embedding C++ libraries or new language bindings into Godot. This had the advantage that users wouldn’t need to build the engine themselves but import a dynamic library.
